description: This file defines a Dojo widget class 'Todo' for managing individual todo items, including editing, saving, reverting, toggling completion, and removal functionalities.

classes.name: Todo
classes.description: A widget class representing a single todo item with editing, saving, reverting, toggling, and removal capabilities.

methods.name: startup
methods.description: Initializes the widget, sets up computed property for editing state.

methods.name: editTodo
methods.description: Sets the current todo as being edited.

methods.name: invokeSaveEdits
methods.description: Handles saving edits asynchronously, returning a promise.

methods.name: saveEdits
methods.description: Saves the current edits to the todo, updates the widget state accordingly.

methods.name: revertEdits
methods.description: Reverts the current edits and restores the original todo state.

methods.name: toggleCompleted
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of the todo.
